author: Justine Kostechka

review: Google Chromecast is real cool device for TV streaming. Though there are various options for TV streaming in market like Smart players, Apple TV, Game consoles etc. Chromecast come real handy in today's world where most of TV viewing is limited to Netflix, Hulu, Youtube etc.Requirement: TV with HDMI port. Smart phone/Tablet/Computer.Pros:1. Best thing about chromecast is its price. In just $32 or $35 you can convert your plain LED TV to Smart TV.2. Configuring Chromecast is very simple. Once configured you can control your TV through your Smart phones and Tablets (Android and Apple only, no support for windows or Blackberry). You need to just connect any smart phones/tablets/laptops to same wifi network.3. When you are casting TV shows or movies from smart phone or tablet, it doesn't play program from phone/tablet, it simply pick program from cloud. So, your phone/tablets are free for other usage. You can start program from one device and stop from other.4. You don't need to put your Youtube, Netflix etc credentials in the chromecast. So, even if your friends visiting your place, they can simply connect their phone to your wifi and stream videos using their account.5. With extension for Chrome browser you can clone your laptop screen to TV wirelessly. No need of HDMI cables.Cons:1. It doesn't play High Definition Videos - 1080p2. Power cable is small.3. Apps are very limited currently.
